data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Lavalleja, Uruguay.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Lavalleja, Uruguay
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Lavalleja, Uruguay with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Lavalleja, Uruguay a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Lavalleja, Uruguay to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Minas
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Minas, Lavalleja, Uruguay.
Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Lavalleja. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of Lavalleja.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.section_summary:
the state of Lavalleja, Uruguay has a population of 58,900.

We estimate Lavalleja has 4,297 people who might know Jesus, 34,887 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 19,717 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help 11 new simple churches start among the 58,900 people in the state of Lavalleja, Uruguay. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.
